2020 has been a good year for beavers in England! The canals and dams beavers build alleviate flood risk and create wetlands for other species. 

400 years ago they were hunted to extinction, find out about the successes we've seen in their reintroduction: https://t.co/JSWh5o63Kd

tweets.text: For those that think these are extreme weather events these are the discharge notices for 1 year. The fish will be feminised through chemical exposure https://t.co/GyUpZtd39N

@EmmaHowardBoyd @tomheapmedia @BBCRadio4 @flimsin @EnvAgency @RGS_IBG @AdaptOurWorld @WRIClimate @GCAdaptation Yes, exactly. We have the solutions, we just need the will to implement! We were proud to support behind the scenes on the Educating and Empowering Girls episode. What could be more positive than improving education and providing reproductive health services?

Fantastic to hear an upbeat and optimistic programme on @BBCRadio4 just now "39 Ways to Save the Planet". Each episode reveals an invention, idea or practice which is helping to cut carbon without breaking the bank. Find out more, and listen, here: https://t.co/xvwCMYx5gx https://t.co/W91U1uc3P7

tweets.text: Deadline extended for grassland derogations for livestock manure in NVZs. The deadline for applications was 31 Dec 2020. But the @EnvAgency recognised that this was a short application window & will use its best efforts to process applications received between 1 Jan-31 Jan 2021.

.@EnvAgency monitor #groundwater quality across a large network of #boreholes across the country in a variety of #aquifer types. This enables #hydrogeologists & #geochemists to see how groundwater quality in the #rocks beneath your feet varies over time also detecting #pollution https://t.co/7KpduP1ykc

@FrancesAnderson @EnvAgencyAnglia Hi Frances, it appears the Env. Agency are already aware and are investigating.

See: https://t.co/mCUvrWSbz5

We monitor #groundwater quality across England to help us protect & manage our resources

Find out whats in our groundwater for a wide range of compounds & substances now available via open data  https://t.co/YdY2VUv6qg

We use sophisticated instruments to detect these substances https://t.co/NsNSzDC4yY
